title: Sage 50 Premium Accounting 2023 U.S. with Payroll 1-User 1-Year Subscription Small Business Accounting Software
description: Sage 50 Premium Accounting is an easy-to-use desktop subscription accounting software for 1-5 users total, with advanced budgeting tools to track financials, job cost, and process payroll. Formerly Peachtree Accounting, we have supported small businesses for 41 years.
